overview: When it comes to tracking down aliens posing as hot male exotic dancers, the Babes in Black are on the job. Their objective: track em' down, fuck em' hard, and when they've been thoroughly de-spermed, fry em' into little hunks of sizzling goo. What a great job for a highly sexual, young woman who just want to get wickedly fucked and move onto the next victim. And, she's doing her patriotic duty to boot.
title: Babes in Black
